    • create

      @POST @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") @RolesAllowed({"admin","contributor"}) public javax.ws.rs.core.Response create(Question question)
      Create a new question.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to create.
      Returns:
      201 Created if the question was created successfully.

    • read

      @GET @Consumes("*") @Produces("application/json") @PermitAll public javax.ws.rs.core.Response read()
      Read all questions ordered by name.
      Returns:
      200 OK if the questions were read successfully.

    • read

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      200 OK if the question was read successfully.

    • readCategoriesByDifficulty

    • readCategory

      @GET @Consumes("*") @Produces("application/json") @Path("/difficulty/{difficulty}/category/{category}") @PermitAll public javax.ws.rs.core.Response readCategory(@PathParam("difficulty") String difficulty, @PathParam("category") String category)
      Read all questions for a given difficulty and category.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - the difficulty to read questions for.
      category - the category to read questions for.
      Returns:
      200 OK if the questions were read successfully.

    • readAvailableDifficulties

      @GET @Consumes("*") @Produces("application/json") @Path("/difficulty/available") @PermitAll public javax.ws.rs.core.Response readAvailableDifficulties()
      Read all available difficulties. A difficulty is available if it has at least 6 categories.
      Returns:
      200 OK if the available difficulties were read successfully.

    • readDifficulty

      Parameters:
      id - The id of the question to update.
      question - The updated question.
      Returns:

    • updateAllCategory

      @PUT @Consumes("text/plain") @Produces("application/json") @Path("/difficulty/{difficulty}/category/{category}") @RolesAllowed("admin") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateAllCategory(@PathParam("difficulty") String difficulty, @PathParam("category") String oldCategoryValue, String newCategoryValue)
      Update a category.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The difficulty of the category to update.
      oldCategoryValue - The old category value.
      newCategoryValue - The new category value.
      Returns:
      200 OK if the category was updated successfully.

    • delete

      @DELETE @Consumes("*/*") @Produces("*/*") @Path("/id/{id}") @RolesAllowed({"admin","contributor"}) public javax.ws.rs.core.Response delete(@PathParam("id") org.bson.types.ObjectId id)
      Delete a question by id.
      Returns:
      a 204 No Content response if the question was deleted successfully.
